description: Certified refurbished from Bose direct with the same warranty as buying new.

description: Thor: Ragnarok and Jojo Rabbit director Taika Waititi is reportedly attached to direct a new Judge Dredd movie that will draw inspiration from the comics.

description: Still Alienware's thinnest 16" gaming laptop ever.

description: Pandora awaits.
title: Humble Bundle Has All of the Borderlands Games for Only $16 Ahead of the Borderlands 4 Release Date

author: Chris Reed
description: Line of Fire: Burnt Moon manages to bring much of the same tense, tactical decision making of Osprey’s larger Undaunted series to a smaller bite-sized game that only takes about a half hour to play.
title: Line of Fire: Burnt Moon Board Game Review

author: Erik Adams
description: A movie that’ll just about keep young viewers’ attention, Smurfs is part Rihanna jukebox musical, and part flimsy attempt to give the little blue critters an identity that’ll stick.
title: Smurfs Review

author: Eric Song
description: This is an excellent budget GPU for 1080p gaming.
title: The PNY GeForce RTX 5060 Ti 16GB Graphics Card Is Available at Launch Price (No Markup)

author: Chris Reed
description: Flip 7 is an easy recommendation regardless of your experience with card games, the size of your collection, or even your age.
title: Flip 7 Card Game Review

author: Kevin Lee
description: We've tested gaming headsets ranging from budget models to fancy wireless ones with 7.1 surround, and everything in between. Based on our testing, here are the best gaming headsets.
title: Best Gaming Headsets in 2025 To Buy Now: Wired and Wireless

author: Eric Song
description: This Amazon Prime Day deal is back for a little while longer.
title: The Apple AirPods 4 Earbuds with Noise Cancelation Just Dropped to $120 (Save 33% Off)

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Considering that Karl Urban’s Johnny Cage is the main protagonist of Mortal Kombat II, just how much will the Scorpion-Noob Saibot subplot figure into the sequel, especially since Hiroyuki Sanada has become an even more in-demand (and award-winning) actor since the first film thanks to the success of Shogun?
title: Mortal Kombat 2: How Much Does Scorpion vs. Noob Saibot Factor Into the Sequel?

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Today is Disneyland's 70th anniversary and we had the chance to exclusively speak to the park's president, Thomas Mazloum, for his first national interview about the past, present, and great big beautiful DisneylandForward of the Walt's original theme park that changed everything.
title: Exclusive: Disneyland President Thomas Mazloum on the Park's Past, Present, and Great Big Beautiful DisneylandForward on Its 70th Anniversary

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Upcoming PlayStation 5 exclusive Ghost of Yotei is getting its own official popcorn bucket as the video game crosses the divide into blockbuster movie territory.
title: PlayStation Exclusive Ghost of Yotei Gets Official Popcorn Bucket Inspired by a Traditional Japanese Rice Bucket

author: Matt Kim
description: The Legend of Zelda movie has cast two relatively unknown actors to play Link and Princess Zelda and that's great news for anyone excited for the upcoming Nintendo movie.
title: Nobody's Heard of the New Zelda and Link, and That's a Very Good Thing

author: Christian Wait
description: Berserk 1997 TV series Blu-ray under $36, Anker charging station down to $35.99, and $550 off LG’s 39" UltraGear OLED 240Hz monitor.
title: Deals For Today: Beserk (1997) Is Under $36

author: Eric Van Allen
title: Julian LeFay, 'Father of The Elder Scrolls,' Steps Back From Game Development Due To Cancer

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Jeopardy’s got one of us, folks. Current reigning champion Scott Riccardi just completed an insane 10-day streak on the beloved game show — and it turns out he’s an active Super Smash Bros. competitor online. Can we get a W in the chat for Scott, please?
title: Super Smash Bros. Competitor Lands 10-Day Winning Streak on Jeopardy — Earning $262,101 So Far

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Epic Games Store is giving away Sid Meier’s Civilization 6 Platinum Edition away for free on PC for an entire week starting today.
title: Civilization 6 Platinum Edition Gives Players Free Game and DLC on the Epic Games Store

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Ahead of the trailer’s global online debut, IGN chatted exclusively with actor Karl Urban – who brings the iconic Johnny Cage to life in Mortal Kombat II – as well as director Simon McQuoid and producer Todd Garner in their first extensive interviews about the highly anticipated sequel.
title: Mortal Kombat II Trailer Showcases Karl Urban’s Down on His Luck Johnny Cage: 'He Has No Self-Confidence'

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: After playing Skate for well over five hours, not only I can clearly see the direction developer Full Circle is taking the series, but I can also say that Skate is shaping up to be a game worthy of being the long-awaited sequel to 2010’s Skate 3.
title: Can Skate Revive the Old-School Magic?

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Comixology and Kindle are teaming up to host a cool scavenger hunt at San Diego Comic-Con, one that offers free comics and the chance to win a Kindle Colorsoft.
title: Comixology to Host Exclusive Scavenger Hunt at Comic-Con 2025

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: James Bond fans who always wanted more of Q should check out Quartermaster, a new management sim/base-builder where you run a secret spy agency where you develop gadgets, train agents, and manage your staff.
title: Quartermaster, a Spy-Agency Management Sim, Announced for PC

author: Tom Phillips
description: Netflix is finally ready to move forward with its live-action Assassin's Creed series, five years on from when the project was first announced.
title: Assassin's Creed Live-Action Netflix Series 'About Power and Violence and Sex and Greed and Vengeance', Showrunners Say, as Project Finally Moves Forward

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Razer has brought its officially licensed Pokémon collection of accessories to territories outside of Asia, meaning you can now get your hands on an official Pokémon mouse, keyboard, headset, or deskmat.
title: Razer Rolls Out Official Pokémon PC Gaming Accessories

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered development studio Virtuos has said it remains "fully committed" to ongoing work on the game, as well as its contributions to Cyberpunk 2077 and Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, despite shedding up to 270 staff.
title: Despite Laying Off 270 Staff, Development Studio Virtuos Remains 'Fully Committed' to The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, Cyberpunk 2077, and Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Joker star Joaquin Phoenix recently returned to The Late Show after a whopping 15 years — but something else also happened: he apologized for his infamous David Letterman interview from 2009 that took place on the show before Letterman turned the reins over to Stephen Colbert.
title: Joker Star Joaquin Phoenix Says Infamous Letterman Interview Was 'Horrible' and He'd 'Never Do It Again': 'One of the Worst Nights of My Life'

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: The 1990 remake of Night of the Living Dead is getting a 4K steelbook that's now available to preorder. It's set to release on September 23.
title: The 1990 Remake of Night of the Living Dead Is Getting a 4K Steelbook

author: Leanne Butkovic
description: The Boox Note Air 4C is a fantastic color e-ink tablet for anyone interested in cutting distractions and adding organization to their day.
title: Boox Note Air 4C Review

author: Michael Cripe
description: Prime Video has renewed Invincible for Season 5 ahead of Season 4's premiere in 2026.
title: Invincible Renewed for Season 5 at Prime Video Ahead of Season 4 Premiere in 2026

author: Tom Marks
description: A gritty, metroidvania reboot of Pac-Man.
title: Shadow Labyrinth Review in Progress

author: Tom Phillips
description: The production of HBO's new Harry Potter TV series will include the construction of a temporary school that can house up to 600 pupils.
title: Harry Potter HBO Show Building Real School Alongside Hogwarts, With Space for Up to 600 Cast Members

author: Casey DeFreitas
description: The Pokémon World Championships in Anaheim, CA are just around the corner in August, and with it comes an exclusive line of cute Pokémon merch, which IGN has an exclusive first look at.
title: Exclusive First Look at 2025 Pokémon World Championships Merch

author: George Nash
title: Jump into Cyberpunk Battle Royale Off The Grid, Available Now on Steam

author: Christian Wait
description: As of July 18, Pokémon TCG’s Black Bolt and White Flare sets deliver 156 Unova Pokémon, Black White Rare cards like Zekrom ex and Reshiram ex, and an Illustration Rare for every single species.
title: Pokémon TCG: Black Bolt and White Flare Preview — Why This Dual Expansion Is Epic

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Check out an exclusive preview of Thanksgiving #1, a darkly comedic and disturbingly relevant new horror comic coming in October 2025.
title: Thanksgiving Is a Hilarious But Disturbingly Relevant Horror Comic

author: Matt Kim
description: With the release of Superman the DCU is fully underway, except for video games. But based on everything James Gunn has said, WB Games is changing how they make superhero games.
title: Everything We Know About James Gunn's DCU Video Game Plans

author: Tom Phillips
description: When Earth's mightiest heroes finally unite to take on Doctor Doom, who will lead the charge? Well, according to The Fantastic Four: The First Steps director Matt Shakman, it'll be Pedro Pascal's Reed Richards — an answer that has surprised many Marvel fans.
title: With Iron Man and Steve Rogers' Captain America Gone, The Fantastic Four: First Steps Director Reveals Pedro Pascal's Reed Richards Will 'Lead the Avengers'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds will be sold as a physical Nintendo Switch game with the "full base game" included on a 64GB cartridge.
title: Sega Addresses Concerns Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Will Be Sold As a Game-Key Card on Nintendo Switch 2, Confirms The 'Full Base Game' Will Be Included On the 64GB Cartridge

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Roblox has announced a new range of safety features directed specifically at teenagers ages 13-17, including a new age estimation technology that uses AI to guess a user's age based on a video selfie they submit.
title: Roblox's New Safety Features Include an AI That Will Guess Your Age Based on a Video Selfie

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It’s that time of the year again and EA has revealed the cover stars of its next soccer game, FC 26. But this go around there’s concern that the infamous 'Madden curse' has spread to EA’s soccer series, after joint cover stars Jude Bellingham and Jamal Musiala suffered significant injuries that left them facing lengthy spells on the sidelines.
title: Jude Bellingham and Jamal Musiala Are the FC 26 Cover Stars — and Fans Are Now Wondering if the 'Madden Curse' Has Spread to Soccer

author: Tom Phillips
description: The alleged risk of using a well-known exploit in Pokémon Go is causing widespread confusion among its community, fuelled by a dire warning from a senior player that supposedly originates from the game's own development team.
title: Amid Fan Confusion Around the Risks of Using a Well-Known Pokémon Go Exploit, the Game's Developer Responds by Pointing Back to its Terms of Service — Which Lay Out its Rules on Cheating

author: Tom Phillips
description: Donkey Kong Bananza is out today, and the game's credits have now confirmed Nintendo's main new voice actor behind Donkey Kong.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Credits Confirm DK's New Voice Actor — and There's a Fresh Voice for Pauline Too

author: Vikki Blake
description: Silent Hill and Slitterhead creator Keiichiro Toyama is working on a brand new game — and it doesn't sound like Slitterhead 2.
title: Silent Hill and Slitterhead Creator Keiichiro Toyama Is Already Working On His Next Game — And It's Not Slitterhead 2

author: Lauren Harper
description: Check out our updated list of all current codes for Grow a Garden.
title: Grow a Garden Codes (July 2025)

author: Tristan Ogilvie
description: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business offers another serving of ultra violence to indulge in but doesn’t do much by way of new spins on the original’s action. It’s a form of mindless fun that’s as familiar as it is ferocious.
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Games Workshop has added a Black Library logo to its official Big Summer Warhammer Preview showcase, sparking speculation the company may announce new novels that finally move the overarching Warhammer 40,000 narrative forward.
title: Big Summer Warhammer Preview Adds Black Library Logo and Now Warhammer 40,000 Lore Fans Are Hoping Games Workshop Is Finally Ready to Move the Narrative Forward

author: Michael Higham
description: The Razer Iskur V2 X chair might be the more "budget" option, but it still offers solid comfort and build quality, making it a good value despite some notable trade-offs.
title: The Cheaper Razer Iskur V2 X Is A Solid Gaming Chair With A Few Compromises

author: Adam Mathew
description: There’s something oddly satisfying about scooping up post-sale scraps that should be gone by now.
title: I Just Banana Slipped Into a Bunch of Not Prime Day Deals That Are Way Better
